alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 6:25AM CST until March 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 19.3 Wed 5 am CST 19.1 19.1 19.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 7 PM CST.
